text: Avalanche Express is a 1979 Irish American action adventure thriller movie directed by Mark Robson and was based on the 1977 novel of the same name by Colin Forbes. It stars Lee Marvin, Robert Shaw, Linda Evans, Maximilian Schell, Joe Namath, Horst Buchholz, Mike Connors, Claudio Cassinelli, Sky du Mont, David Hess, GÃ¼nter Meisner and Cyril Shaps and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1979 adventure movies Category:Irish adventure movies Category:1970s American adventure movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Mark Robson Category:Movies set in Milan Category:Movies set in Switzerland Category:1970s English-language movies Category:American action thriller movies Category:American spy movies Category:1970s spy movies Category:1979 thriller movies Category:Movies about terrorism Category:Cold War movies Category:1970s American action movies
title: Avalanche Express
